title: The Creation
summary: God created the heavens and the earth in six days and rested on the seventh.
content: In the beginning, God created the heaven and the earth.
And the earth was without form, and void; and darkness was upon the face of the deep.
And God said, Let there be light: and there was light.
And the evening and the morning were the first day.

title: Noah and the Ark
summary: God instructed Noah to build an ark to save his family and animals from a flood.
content: Noah was a just man and perfect in his generations, and Noah walked with God.
And God said unto Noah, The end of all flesh is come before me.
Make thee an ark of gopher wood.
And the waters prevailed upon the earth.

title: David and Goliath
summary: Young David defeats the giant Goliath with a sling and faith in God.
content: Then said David to the Philistine, Thou comest to me with a sword...
But I come to thee in the name of the Lord of hosts...
David put his hand in his bag, and took thence a stone, and slang it...
And smote the Philistine in his forehead...
